definitions.definition: To prod, attack, or injure someone with a pike.
To bet or gamble with only small amounts of money.
Often followed by on or out: to quit or back out of a promise.
definitions.example: Donâ€™t pike on me like you did last time!

definitions.definition: (thieves' cant) To depart or travel (as if by a turnpike), especially to flee, to run away.
Furnished with a pike; ending in a point
Describing a dive in which the knees are kept straight, but the body is bent at a right-angle at the hips
